entry.title: Contact
entry.summary:
Information and registration on this site http://openforum.be

Information list

Those interested can register to the distribution list (small volume max 1-2 mails per month) OpenForumInfo@openforum.be on https://listes.domainepublic.net/listinfo/openforuminfo

Discussion list

People wishing to talk with the other participants can register to the discussof@openforum.be mailing list on https://listes.domainepublic.net/listinfo/discussof

Additional information by e-mail and by mail to info@openforum.be

Coordination

Nicolas Pettiaux npettiaux@openforum.be, portable : +32 496 24 55 01
